summary: Feature request to support user metadata in PHP SDK by accepting optional static summary and details on workflow start operations, summary for timers and activities, and handling the __temporal_workflow_metadata query to align with Go SDK implementation.
userImpact: Users gain the ability to attach custom metadata to workflows, activities, and timers for better observability and tracking within the PHP SDK.
proposedFix: Implement metadata support consistent with Go SDK (PR #1597), including optional summary/details parameters and __temporal_workflow_metadata query handling.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented with metadata support across workflow start methods, timers, and activities, plus __temporal_workflow_metadata query handling.
keyQuote: Accept optional "static summary" and "static details" on all ways to start a workflow (start, signal with start, schedule, and child workflow) and populate user metadata with them
